website_summaries.verdict: Two multi-purpose, all-metal whistles that come with user-friendly accessories. A solid deal.
pros: These two whistles stand out for their small design, which makes them easy to tuck into your pocket
Works for dog training and other purposes
Includes two lanyards and key ring clips
cons: Not as loud as some consumers expected, but sound is just right for many training purposes

customer_reviews.title: Happy
customer_reviews.text: I bought these whistles based on the good reviews. I did receive them on time and was pleased with the extra lanyard that came with it. I am disappointed that only one of them works. Paid for a pair and one is useless. UPDATE! I have changed my rating to 5 stars. Unexpectedly today I received two more whistles in the mail. Both work beautifully and super loud. I can only assume the seller read my review and took it upon themselves to make my order right. Excellent product and customer service. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: NOT as pictured, inferior quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought the black whistle ENTIRELY because the photo shows a MACHINED and HARD ANODIZED aluminum whistle, unlike the $1 cheesy cast, bead blasted whistle shown in the second photo. Admittedly, the whistle works ok, but I collect and wear one everyday and I like an exceptional product, I already have several of the cheesy ones. Rather than waste my time getting to the UPS store 32 miles away, I just made these whistles as gifts to friends. FURA makes a whistle of similar quality but much better sound. I currently wear the Fenix NW20. My message to the seller...stop misrepresenting what you are offering. Other than that this piece would get no more than three stars.
customer_reviews.author: Buffalo Bill

customer_reviews.title: Great for Dog Recall & Emergencies.
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality and extremely loud. Looks well made. I am using this as a recall tool to train my puppy. I don't even try to blow very hard purposely and it is still loud, but not deafening. However if you want to use it to its full potential it is definitely LOUD. Works great with the pup, he comes running every time. Again I use it softly for the sake of my pup's ears and so my neighbors don't go crazy. Will be using the second one for emergencies, so turned out great to have 2. Highly recommended for both training and emergencies.
customer_reviews.author: N4th4li3

customer_reviews.title: Your Whistle Search Stops Here
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a whistle to take with me when I go hiking, but there are so many whistles sold on Amazon that I wasn't sure which one to choose. I finally opted to purchase these Michael Josh whistles and am very happy with that decision. The whistles appear to be high quality, and I like the fact that they come with both a lanyard and a carabiner. When they arrived, I tried both of them while inside my home and I can attest to the fact that they are definitely LOUD! Hope I never have to use them, but I have packed them in my backpack for my next hiking trip just in case.
customer_reviews.author: D.B.

customer_reviews.title: Not a real dog whistle
customer_reviews.text: Dog whistles are supposed to whistle at a frequency higher than human hearing. It should be nearly silent to our own ears. This whistle is extremely loud and elicits no reaction from my dog. I don’t know how it got so many positive reviews. Either they are not sending everyone the same product or people really don’t know what they are supposed to be getting. If you want a whistle so loud it pops you and your dogs ear drums then this is a great product. If you want a real dog whistle look elsewhere as I will be doing the same.
customer_reviews.author: Leah Jools

customer_reviews.title: A great package !
customer_reviews.text: The whistle is loud as advertised and the lanyard and carabiner make it complete. I highly recommend to dog owners or for emergencies. Since it doesn't have an internal ball like traditional one it's good come rain or shine.
customer_reviews.author: robert

customer_reviews.title: Could be a lifesaver
customer_reviews.text: Nice whistle, aesthetically it looks very nice and is very loud. Great price too. The only issue is that the actual ring and chain are not stainless or aluminum so if you are using it in or around water, especially salt water while kayaking it will Rust. The manufacturer should have gone the extra mile and just used stainless or aluminum rings and chain. A quick fix is just to eliminate them and find a stainless or aluminum ring or just use a piece of cordage.
customer_reviews.author: John C. Tucker III

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality, EXTREMELY lightweight and compact
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality, EXTREMELY lightweight and compact. Do not have to worry about getting damaged, very sturdy. Piercingly loud. I was also pleasantly surprised by the quality of the extras (carabiners and lanyards). The lanyards were better quality that much of what you find in stores.
customer_reviews.author: LSB

customer_reviews.title: Not stainless steel as described in boxed in description!
customer_reviews.text: Two different descriptions are listed for the whistle. The more noticeable boxed in description says “Strong and Durable,stainless steel material ensures the whistle durable” However, the whistles are not stainless steel, but aluminum as indicated in the less noticeable description. Very disappointed to receive aluminum when expecting stainless steel.
customer_reviews.author: Snowski

customer_reviews.title: Like Fire Alarm
customer_reviews.text: Received at the office, and decided to try one out. Maybe not a great idea, as a colleague thought the fire alarm was being tested. It's that loud, and a similar tone. Just as pictured: solid aluminum, with cloth lanyards and a small carabiner as a bonus.
customer_reviews.author: Office Supplies

customer_reviews.title: <Much> Louder Than Loud
customer_reviews.text: This whistle is so loud that it should require some sort of license to buy it. I tried it with just a little puff and it was loud, but then, on a whim I blew really hard. This result was an ear-shattering, piercing shriek that I will never repeat - probably lost some hearing on that experiment. I think the whistle works well, but it would be prudent to wear earplugs under a set of good quality noise-cancelling headphones to use it. That’s why I gave it four stars - you need protective gear. Nearby animals with sensitive hearing will likely drop dead and any indoor use will result in family derision and censure.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Btfsplk

customer_reviews.title: Its not made of stainless steel
customer_reviews.text: I bought this whistle based on the statement in the description that its made of stainless steel. It is not!!! Its made of a soft aluminum and I doubt it will take any abuse it may get on my keychain. Buyer beware
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: A good item to protect yourself - harmless but will work
customer_reviews.text: Everybody should have it available - wearing around the neck under the T-Shirt during jogging alone in the forest or other lonely area
customer_reviews.author: Alexa Rostoska

customer_reviews.title: Great for Gift Baskets
customer_reviews.text: Bought to be part of gift baskets for Christmas. Every female got one from Great Grandma to the 12 year olds. They like them so much they call them the "cousins rape whistle". I was told they want to make sure receiving the whistle is part of all our young girls party upon entry into the teenage years. The Great Grandma won't leave home without it, and asked if I had bought any extras she could give to her friends. The whistles are well made and can fit lanyard or key ring.
customer_reviews.author: Blueberrybuckle

customer_reviews.title: One works, One does'nt.
customer_reviews.text: Only one whistle works, wrote to the seller and asked for a replacement, no response. So my review reflects; Poor Quality 50% not working, Poor customer service; No response to request.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fairly good product BUT made of alumium not stainless steel
customer_reviews.text: For the price paid, this is a fairly good product. However, I was specifically looking for a stainless steel whistle not aluminum. The description next to item picture says stainless steel and description below says aluminum; whistles are made of aluminum. Also lanyards are similar to those your get at conferences, they may not last if metal clips get damaged. Personally I wanted more durability, so I be gifting these whistles.
customer_reviews.author: Dale A

customer_reviews.title: I'm not sure if I like it
customer_reviews.text: You have to blow a big amout of air if you want to make it sound properly. If you just blow a little it doesn't sound too much, if you do a big blow it sounds a lot, no mid level.
customer_reviews.author: Javi

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend this for dog training or as an emergency whistle.
customer_reviews.text: My little dog is dog whistle trained. But when she's all the way across the property we're hanging out down by the barn I have to walk halfway down with my dog whistle. but with this whistle I can stand right at my doorway blow it for a few seconds and she comes running. If you were standing next to someone or if you were lost in the forest or even as a rape whistle these are extremely loud and extremely effective.
customer_reviews.author: Scott "John Wayne" Branam

customer_reviews.title: Great for my mom to use in her gardens.
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my elderly mom to use while she’s tending to her flower gardens. She’s fallen twice and needed assistance to get up. My concern was that someday no one would hear her yell for help. This whistle is very loud. I feel certain anyone in the area will hear it and come to her aid. She keeps it by the door and slips it over her head each time she goes out. So far she hasn’t had to use it. It’s comforting knowing she has something to signal for help should she need it!
customer_reviews.author: ErmsMom

customer_reviews.title: Awesome whistles.
customer_reviews.text: I do like these whistles a lot. Good quality, light weight and pretty loud. If I do have 1 complaint it would be that some of the links of the chain on the whistles are half open and I don't know if these could open up with extreme use causing the whistle to fall without being noticed. Ill try and tighten them with some pliers and that should do the trick but I wish it came that way and I didnt have to do it.
customer_reviews.author: Lorelle Dias

customer_reviews.title: Great whistle, useless/cheap attachments
customer_reviews.text: Awesome little whistle, seems well made and my dog instantly responded to it. The rings/chains and how they attach to it are cheap garbage however, I took it all off with needle nose pliers and fussed a new tiny ring and a carabiner in place so I could be sure they were attached to something solid. I point this out because I can imagine the whistle instantly getting lost or breaking otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: hjm_50

customer_reviews.title: Loud Whistle but Not the Best Connectors
customer_reviews.text: This is a very loud whistle, yet it is very small and light. Great for signaling or for protection from large animals while out in the woods. The black whistle has a cheap paint and easily wears off. The ring connectors are not durable and I will not trust them. They are just a simple ring that joins end-to-end, instead of a split ring. They do include a large split ring, but it is too large to connect to the whistle directly.
customer_reviews.author: Brian D

customer_reviews.title: Can be modified
customer_reviews.text: These whistles are about the same loudness as my safety whistle from REI. In other words, about as loud as they can be without damaging your ears. Just what I wanted. However, the chain seemed relatively flimsy for my preferences. I noticed that there is a hole on the side where the drill went to make the central chain-hole. Needle nose pliers quickly removed the chain. The one-inch ring went through both drill holes. Attach the ring to the carabiner and now I have a sturdy attachment to my backpack. Took less than five minutes. I gave this five stars because the picture clearly showed the chain. My fault for not noticing.
customer_reviews.author: Fred Schreiber

customer_reviews.title: Two Whistles
customer_reviews.text: Ear-piercing whistle complete with lanyard and carabiner, set of 2. I attached mine to my key chain and gave the second one to my single, female neighbor who wears hers around her neck. She remarked how thoughtful I was and tested it (briefly) since it was too loud for her ears. I use mine to call the athletes in when practice is over; every one of them hears it.
customer_reviews.author: GsoGlenn

customer_reviews.title: Good whistle bad chain
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these to go on my little niece and nephews backpacks in case they were ever separated from me and I needed to find them while hiking. The chain broke after 4 min of them being attached to their packs and the kids blowing on them twice. The whistle itself is good you’ll have to replace the chain if you don’t want to lose it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good value- bought for hiking kids. Weak chain.
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 kids that needed whistles when we go hiking. Good price, loud enough to get immediate attention and i liked the lanyard and carabiner options. My only complaint is the Keychain attached is very weak. A slight tug and the ring on the chain pulled apart. That just means they go IN the backpack instead of being clipped onto the outside. Still worth the price for their purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Ford

customer_reviews.title: VERY NICE !
customer_reviews.text: These are great! I bought them for all my family members as a little extra Christmas present. The primary reason for buying these was for my little niece and nephews. They like playing in the woods and this way if they get into any kind of trouble they can easily let the adults know. And I'm hoping possibly could scare off any wild animal that could get after them
customer_reviews.author: Jason Vegan

customer_reviews.title: Loud  emergency whistle
customer_reviews.text: My 90 yo MIL fell in the bathroom in the middle of the night. Had a hard time summoning help. I ordered these whistles and they have been placed where she can reach them if she falls or if she is feeling bad she can wear one. the are fairly flat and light weight and have a lanyard on them and are very loud. This has given her peace of mind that she will be able to get help quickly, and now I am her favorite,LOL.
customer_reviews.author: cinnamon

customer_reviews.title: Loud
customer_reviews.text: I blew this gently, and my Mom had a fit. I wanted to test it. I imagine these will blow your ears off when you blow full-strength. Good for emergencies.
customer_reviews.author: S P

customer_reviews.title: What a whistle!!!
customer_reviews.text: It’s definitely loud. Don’t make the mistake of trying it out inside or you might blow your ear drums out!! Bought for a wildlife trip versus bear spray. Thankfully, didn’t have to use it but I feel confident it would have done the job should anything have crossed our paths!! A nice Addition, can wear as lanyard or clip to belt or pocket.
customer_reviews.author: Constance Corbin

customer_reviews.title: FINALLY A LOUDDDDD WHISTLE
customer_reviews.text: I bought a lot of whistles that said they where loud...they LIED. I've stopped buying whistles because this one FINALLY worked like I wanted one to. BEST WHISTLE I EVER BOUGHT> I'm getting one for all my hunting buddies as stocking stuffers for Christmas. Going to give some to the grandchildren to.Let them drive their parents crazy!!!
customer_reviews.author: poky

customer_reviews.title: Light and loud
customer_reviews.text: Small and really loud, which is just what I was looking for to tuck into my small bag on my mountain bike. They're plastic and the chain attachment is less than I would have liked but not planning on relying on it to hold. But I was shocked and pleased on the volume, which is why you buy a whistle.
customer_reviews.author: DenverJohn

customer_reviews.title: I intend to buy more for gifts.  Good on a key chain.
customer_reviews.text: These whistles will come in handy on walks, in the outdoors hiking, and for my husband to alert me when he needs something out in his shop but can't step away from his project. Makes me feel a bit better about him being out there alone too because he has fallen a few times and I couldn't hear him to help out.
customer_reviews.author: BLace

customer_reviews.title: Defective Whistle  - no noise
customer_reviews.text: I was pretty surprised to find that one of the whistles did not work at all. When you blow on it, you can just hear the air passing through, it wouldn't even pass as a whistle. One whistle did work, but I was buying this for myself and a friend, so pretty bummed that I'll have to buy it again since I ended up just having to throw it out.
customer_reviews.author: Marni O.

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Nothing particularly special about these except that they are very nice looking compared to a regular whistle and you get two so I am able to keep one attached to my day pack and one attached to my backpacking pack. I don't find them particularly loud, but I think they're probably as loud as most. Satisfied with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Trish

customer_reviews.title: In case of emergencies
customer_reviews.text: Bought to add to my emergency kit! They are both very loud and that’s that I didn’t even blow into it that hard! I like that they sent the option to use it as a lanyard or add it to a key. I will definitely purchase more and keep them handy! Hope I never have to use it but if i do, i know they’ll do the trick
customer_reviews.author: Berenice Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Good idea.....
customer_reviews.text: Got this for when walking the dog in the dark and put a second one in my glove box in case of a break down......blew out a tire one night and this would have made me feel better. When walking the dog and you see eyes glistening it comes in very handy....
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You can stop looking at other whistles.
customer_reviews.text: I bought a few whistles from Walmart in their camping section because I needed them that day to go Kayaking. Wasn't impressed with them; blow too soft or too hard and they don't produce sound. These whistles here that I ordered from Amazon are loud! The harder you blow the louder they get. You can't go wrong with this pair! Buy these these ones.
customer_reviews.author: Corey Comperatore

customer_reviews.title: Perfect emergency whistle
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice whistle! It’s made of metal and it comes with a lanyard and a little metal thingy to put on your keychain. Very loud! Which is perfect because I’m using it as a emergency whistle. It’s durable and it has a nice weight to it. Definitely recommend if you work late and/or your worried about your safety.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for me!
customer_reviews.text: I wear as a piece of jewelry b/c my voice is not working well. I bought it b/c it does not look like a whistle. I can use it to get attention when I cannot speak with my voice. I wear one around my neck and I have the other on my keychain.
customer_reviews.author: D L B

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and Loud
customer_reviews.text: If you want a loud lightweight slim whistle, this is for you. Easy to slip in many places. The only reason I gave it a 4 is that I think there should be some kind of rubber type material where you place your lips or teeth. The metal feels very hard on your teeth and almost impossible to keep between your teeth for more than a second.
customer_reviews.author: Mitziepoo

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be good quality - Loud enough for everyday use
customer_reviews.text: Got a set of 2 so that I could give one to a friend. Attached to my house key chain for everyday use. Small security when I walk at night in case I need help. Plan to use when hiking as well to help get located if need be.
customer_reviews.author: Nathalie

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! I am a teacher and use this for recess and it’s perfect. Very loud. It is higher pitched.
customer_reviews.author: Mmmmmb

customer_reviews.title: Great little whistles
customer_reviews.text: Got these four kayaking as required in our state. They are simple, lightweight and sturdy. We just leave them attached to the life jackets so we don't forget them. They are small and smooth so they don't catch on things easily. They are plenty loud enough.
customer_reviews.author: Alison Foster

customer_reviews.title: Dog whistle set!
customer_reviews.text: I like the sturdy lanyard that comes with these whistles. It has been very successful as a dog whistle for my 1-year-old retriever. I can keep one on my keyring and one at the kitchen door. It's plenty loud without being ear-shattering.
customer_reviews.author: Bopie

customer_reviews.title: Item as described
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews as per usual before ordering. The item was delivered promptly as promised. I immediately annoyed everyone in the house with my testing of the product. Very loud, lightweight, and multiple options for carrying, and the price was great. I’m am happy with my order, and will attach one to each of our hiking bags.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Item is nice and loud but if you're going to be Holding ...
customer_reviews.text: Item is nice and loud but if you're going to be Holding it in your teeth as I do when riding my bike through congested areas would be nice if it had a rubber tip.
customer_reviews.author: micro

customer_reviews.title: Arrived with one defective whistle
customer_reviews.text: Leaving only 2 stars because one of the two whistles didn’t work. The one that does work however is very loud, good for the person I ordered them for who is a nurse in a prison and needs these for safety.
customer_reviews.author: FlamencoFire

customer_reviews.title: Gets my attention.
customer_reviews.text: My wife uses it to call me because her voice is too soft as a result of Parkinson's.
customer_reviews.author: EditorMotz

customer_reviews.title: Silver coating is a little cheap
customer_reviews.text: Overall the whistle seems ok. Disappointed in the coating on the silver whistle. I expected higher quality. The whistle is very loud & the product is pretty light. Wish the carabiniere was smaller.
customer_reviews.author: Pkster

customer_reviews.title: good dog whistle
customer_reviews.text: These did what I wanted. They clip to the pack and work great as a whistle to get the dogs attention. If there is any problem with them it is that they are too loud. I try to blow them softly. I should get a couple more for the boat and kayak.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: It’s LOUD!!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 for our kayak PFDs. Liked then so well, bought 2 more to hang by the doors for emergency dog recalls. These are well made and LOUD!! Appreciate the lanyard and carabiner with each. A quality product at a reasonable price. THANKS!!
customer_reviews.author: FBurner

customer_reviews.title: Good whistle
customer_reviews.text: The whistle is light and well made, it requires very little breath to blow and produce a loud sound (i have one that is louder (a little) but requires a very hard blow). The average rating is due to the "hardware" that comes with and attached to the whistle, it is very cheap and not well made or durable.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Milligan

customer_reviews.title: Little breath needed for big sound, lightweight & durable
customer_reviews.text: This is a great whistle that requires a very small amount of breath to make a loud whistle!!! I've given this to some friends who are elderly and at risk of needing assistance if they fall. I've given this to hiking friends who could need assistance in the wilderness and others who walk alone as a safety tool. We all love it and the lanyard it comes with
customer_reviews.author: Arlene  Hercher

customer_reviews.title: I love this! The whistles are loud enough to use ...
customer_reviews.text: I love this! The whistles are loud enough to use in even a noisy environment, and the included lanyards and carabiners mean you can carry them in a variety of ways. The whistle is certainly durable enough to just keep loose in a pocket if you want. Not many of the other whistles I saw listed include the lanyards and carabiners, do these are winners in my book.
customer_reviews.author: Badger

customer_reviews.title: highist I've ever heard
customer_reviews.text: Noise level is highist I've ever heard. VERY loud. I'm happy with my purchase and would recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Beth N.

customer_reviews.title: Not super kid friendly, but fine for an adult
customer_reviews.text: Took them hiking this week. My 8 year old had difficulty getting enough sound out of it. Ended up stopping at cabelas to get a more kid friendly whistle for her and gave these to the teens.
customer_reviews.author: Girl Geek

customer_reviews.title: Fine whistle.
customer_reviews.text: Fine whistle. Got it for someone who recently lost his vocal cord due to cancer. He can no longer call out or speak loudly so the whistle is an emergency button for him. Or just a way for him to call to his wife when he needs her.
customer_reviews.author: Polly

customer_reviews.title: Very LOUD and compact!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to use while out kayaking and hiking.. the included lanyard is very handy and I'm blown away by how simple the design is!! So small with absolutely no moving parts inside.. and depending on how hard you blow you may make yourself deaf !! Extremely loud and good self defense as well !!
customer_reviews.author: evan2293

customer_reviews.title: Not as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: These whistles, would not save your life, in a survival situation. They are not loud enough, they claim to be extremely loud, I don't think anyone would hear it more than a mile away. No good in a survival situation.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph David Conner

customer_reviews.title: Super loud! The order came with two but they ...
customer_reviews.text: Super loud! The order came with two but they even included a complimentary third whistle! Great product as far as whistles go!
customer_reviews.author: Jann Kenny

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: You have to blow pretty hard to get a good noise. Make sure it stays dry out the clamps will start rusting. I like the lanyard, because it is small and is hard to hold in your mouth.
customer_reviews.author: Toni Jenkins

customer_reviews.title: Chuck E. Cheese Garbage
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had sturdier whistles from a happy meal. These are so light and cheap you’d think it was something from a 50 cent toy machine. They’re made in China and not at all good quality. 100% not worth anyone’s money.
customer_reviews.author: LC

customer_reviews.title: Good dog whistle
customer_reviews.text: This is a great dog whistle. It is loud but not painfully loud. No pea to worry about. My dog always comes running when I blow a couple of quick toots. The pitch is clear and carries well.
customer_reviews.author: clvance7

customer_reviews.title: Dual chambers, lightweight, durable, plenty of accessories
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Lightweight but seems durable, comes with everything shown (lanyard+carabiner x2), *LOUD*, solves the problem of distributing the sound by using two whistle tubes in the same device. Will be taking this hiking and wherever an emergency device like this can be helpful. Love the fact that it's a two-pack as well, as I bought this (and a few other safety items) mostly for my girlfriend who works late -- but now I can keep one as well. Also arrived pretty fast from this seller!
customer_reviews.author: Change your public name in the field below

customer_reviews.title: Really Loud!
customer_reviews.text: My whistles never arrived so the seller credited me and sent me a replacement. I was very satisfied and the whistles are great. I take one with me when I walk my dog along with pepper spray so I feel fairly safe. The whistle is very loud, I startled my neighbors the first time I tried it out.
customer_reviews.author: AMR

customer_reviews.title: LOUD!!!
customer_reviews.text: I tried 3 or 4 different whistles for use in hiking emergencies. Thankfully, I haven't had to use them, but these were much louder than any of the others.
customer_reviews.author: J.

customer_reviews.title: Great whistles, replace the chain
customer_reviews.text: The whistles, lanyards and the clips are great. The little chain, attaching the whistle to the holder, not so much. It breaks very easily and is very cheap. Love the whistles though!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Haven’t truly tested and hope not too
customer_reviews.text: I hope I never have to review according to effectiveness. But I keep by my doors just in case. I live where black bears think our garbage cans are their grocery stores.
customer_reviews.author: Mast

customer_reviews.title: Very Very Loud
customer_reviews.text: The whistle is so loud that I thought earplugs should be worn when using. Hopefully I’ll never need to actually use the whistle but it is great to have should there ever be a need.
customer_reviews.author: sark

customer_reviews.title: Loud
customer_reviews.text: Loud. Good for a safety whistle. I would like a little sturdier chain but that can always be replaced with something that fits an individual's needs/set up.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Osborne

customer_reviews.title: Works incredibly well!
customer_reviews.text: Tried out indoors - BIG mistake. Literally made my ears ring / hurt. These are very effective and will be getting more to put in all my hunting / fishing / hiking / emergency bags.
customer_reviews.author: J. G

customer_reviews.title: Great little whistle with limits
customer_reviews.text: Excellent whistle. It's really loud without having to collapse a lung in the process! Good for sports and general outdoor recreation, probably not search and rescue or nautical use
customer_reviews.author: Z_Day Survivor

customer_reviews.title: You just can't imagine how loud these whistles actually are!
customer_reviews.text: Took these whistles out of the package upon arrival and promptly proceeded to test them -- in my kitchen. Yeah, won't be doing that again!! Seriously... :p They are unbelievably loud and feel very well constructed. I'm pretty sure they will last forever. Very satisfied with my purchase, would highly recommend them to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Jim Root

customer_reviews.title: really is very loud
customer_reviews.text: bought this 2pk for myself and my Daughter to put on our keychains. went outside to try it and is really very loud. lol should do the job nicely if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Clement

customer_reviews.title: Work great!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for our paddle boards as we need to have a whistle on board. They come with a neck strap and/or can also be hooked on things easily. Great price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice Loud Sound
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking whistle for my son to take on a high adventure trip. Don’t know how well it will hold up, he hasn’t used it yet. I will amend my review after he uses it.
customer_reviews.author: HealthFitnessBeauty

customer_reviews.title: Did you hear that??!
customer_reviews.text: Super loud!!!! It will make someone come to you, just to get you to stop using it! I hope I never have to use it, but if I do, I know I will get someone's attention.
customer_reviews.author: Joyanna Melton

customer_reviews.title: Extremely loud!
customer_reviews.text: Loudest whistle I have ever heard. If you put your lungs into it you will go def. No moving parts are even better. With lanyard I put mine on my hiking pack for quick access if I need to signal for help or scare wild animals.
customer_reviews.author: wildbillkelso73

customer_reviews.title: Great Emergency Whistle
customer_reviews.text: This whistle is very loud. Even better it does not require any effort (i.e. wind power) to blow. You get 2 whistles with lanyards. The whistle is very sleek looking and lightweight.
customer_reviews.author: Wilma Bookhound

customer_reviews.title: Very loud!
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised at the quality. They are very loud. I like that I can connect them via a carabineros or wear them around my neck with the lanyard provided. Metal not plastic
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: WOW
customer_reviews.text: ONLY TRIED A LITTLE. AFRAID TO GO FULL BLAST. IN AN APARTMENT. LOL I THINK IT'S GREAT!
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: They left out the important part...the WHISTLE
customer_reviews.text: Never had a chance to try the whistle because there was no whistle. All I received was the lanyard! I returned it and will go to Walmart to buy one when it’s safe
customer_reviews.author: sue Kaufman

customer_reviews.title: Loud, but 1 is defective.
customer_reviews.text: Ok, very loud. Bought whistle to recall my dog, and it works well for that. Only 1 of the two don't work and that is a letdown.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: Loud and compact, just what I was looking for when cycling. But the first time I went on a ride, I reached for it and it was gone the cheap little ring to attach the lanyard broke and I lost the whistle!
customer_reviews.author: Claudio Mejias Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Loud
customer_reviews.text: Made a mistake of blowing this to test it upon receiving it, in my car, didn’t end well. It’s loud enough to alert someone and very light.
customer_reviews.author: Leo

customer_reviews.title: Very Loud whistle
customer_reviews.text: Wanted a Loud whistle to walk the dog at night incase I needed help also wanted a loud whistle to wear on my life jacket when kayaking......just in case!
customer_reviews.author: 8ster

customer_reviews.title: very loud, stylish
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for our emergency kit and I think they'll do the job well should we ever need it. The whistle is quite piercing and it looks nice to boot.
customer_reviews.author: Ye Li

customer_reviews.title: very happy with these
customer_reviews.text: got them for emergencies hiking snowboarding and on sail boat. Very loud. i like how they look and work well. would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Really nice whistle.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice whistle. Lightweight yet strong. Not bulky at all. Like the choice of lanyard or clip. Nice that it comes with both! Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra L.

customer_reviews.title: Quality Whistles
customer_reviews.text: This was a great purchase! I bought these whistles to carry in my kayak kits. The whistles are loud, and the assessories were a nice addition.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Camp

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: this whistle can get you death - they are really loud !!!
customer_reviews.author: Dominicandy

customer_reviews.title: Attachments broke off...
customer_reviews.text: The carabiner and circle key holder are NOT durable and had both attachments had fallen apart. I gave one to my niece and it suddenly broke. Needless to say, I was disappointed how Amazon can support an item that is not durable and lousy in quality.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Amazed

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Quality product. Easy to install. ,but did have to make adapter since my swing set was different brand.still was simple Granddaughter lives it .
customer_reviews.author: ANN M.

customer_reviews.title: Very Loud
customer_reviews.text: These are pretty loud. We carry these while walking trails since we read using them *could* scare coyote away. Not sure if that's true but would rather have these than not. They are very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: J_Ramon

customer_reviews.title: REALLY LOUD!
customer_reviews.text: Got these whistles to add to our disaster kits. I tried it and it really made a very loud whistle. However, I would like to suggest that the whistles be packed in a TAMPER-PROOF plastic instead of them being in a tiny ziplock plastic.
customer_reviews.author: shopcentric

customer_reviews.title: Security at hand
customer_reviews.text: Ordered to keep on my keychain as a security measure. Have not had to use but pleased to have it at hand. Adds a level of security, just in case.
customer_reviews.author: Ohiopearl

customer_reviews.title: Oh my! Nice whistles.
customer_reviews.text: Pleasantly surprised at the quality of these whistles. They are my machined out of a single piece of aluminum with dual whistle ports. very loud and effective.
customer_reviews.author: Smoothbassman

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight, sturdy, loud
customer_reviews.text: I bought several packs on sale to go in Samaritan’s purse shoeboxes. It is lightweight, sturdy, & loud. It would be great for personal alarm, camping, sports, etc. I need to buy myself one!
customer_reviews.author: jan anderson

customer_reviews.title: Happy Customer!
customer_reviews.text: Product was as described. Fast shipping. Perfect and easy for my children to use should we need to draw attention in a time of emergency.
customer_reviews.author: Tora Thompson

product_meta.title: Michael Josh 2PCS Outdoor Loudest Emergency Survival Whistles with Carabiner and Lanyard for Camping Hiking Sports Dog Training
feature_bullets: Louder Sound,double tubes can provide up to 150 decibels,can be heard for far distance.
Strong and Durable,stainless steel material ensures the whistle durable
Good Environmental adaptability - The whistle has no built-in pea ,so it will not mold and breed bacteria because of the pea.You can use it in any dust or dirty water environment
Convenient and practical,with kering and carabiner keychain,can tie on your backpack,belt,
Package includes,2 X Whistles with keyring,2 X Color-sorted Carabiner,2 X Lanyard
